message.body: I grabbed a ticket for you to the Butch Walker show, hoping you'll be able to go :) it's April 28 at TLA
$30 with the darn fees! They're such a ripoff.
Perfect! Thanks! Looking forward to it. I can swing by this week and drop Money off. Or if ur free we could meet for a drink.
Sounds good. No rush on the cash but would be great to see you!
Let me know if u have a free night this week.
We prob rather the bar if there is space but we'll see what is available.
